DummyStructure.Name: Option_Cycle_Mando
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Cycles to the next clan skin as the default one used for standard mandalorian soldiers，without needing a Clan leader present. Heroes will override this selection. The following order is used: CLAN: Priority 1 | Protectors CLAN: Priority 2 | Death Watch CLAN: Priority 3 | Maul

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Mandalore_Support_Event
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Open a popup dialog to support a mandalorian clan and recieve their heroes.

DummyStructure.Name: Cheat_Mandalore_Support_Event
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Open a popup dialog to support a mandalorian clan and recieve their heroes at the current planet. Mandalore does not need to be owned.

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Rep_Heroes_Sandbox
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Sandbox mode: Unlock every single hero staff option no matter the era，including dead staff and hero squadrons. Cannot be undone. Applies to the Republic and CIS.

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Clone_Officer_Deaths
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Remove the death requirement for clone officers. This unlocks 4 clones without needing other clones to die. TEXT_NONE TEXT_GOVERNMENT_REPUBLIC_CLONE_LIST TEXT_GOVERNMENT_REPUBLIC_CLONE_DEVISS TEXT_GOVERNMENT_REPUBLIC_CLONE_JET TEXT_GOVERNMENT_REPUBLIC_CLONE_VILL TEXT_GOVERNMENT_REPUBLIC_CLONE_BOW

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Unlock_Tenant
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Unlock Admiral Tenant without Dao needing to die. TEXT_NONE TEXT_GOVERNMENT_REPUBLIC_ADMIRAL_TENANT TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_NILS_TENANT

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Unlock_Jayfon_Senior
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Unlock Jayfon Senior without needing Jayfon Junior to die. TEXT_NONE TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_JAYFON_SENIOR

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Complete_Republic
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Instantly set the senate approval rating to 100%，which unlocks the story options early.

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Complete_Holdouts
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Integrate the Separatist Holdouts without needing two of either Dooku，Trench，or Ningo to die. TEXT_NONE TEXT_GOVERNMENT_CIS_INTEGRATE_REWARD_HEADER TEXT_HERO_DELLSO TEXT_HERO_KENDU

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Hutt_Mobilization_Favour
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Gain 100 Hutt favor to unlock the next mobilization reward(s). Can be used 5 times. TEXT_NONE TEXT_GOVERNMENT_HUTTS_EMPIRE_HEADER TEXT_GOVERNMENT_HUTTS_EMPIRE_OVERVIEW

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Hutt_Scum_Favour
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Gain 20 scum favor to unlock the next underworld reward(s). Can be used 5 times. TEXT_NONE TEXT_GOVERNMENT_HUTTS_SCUM_HEADER TEXT_GOVERNMENT_HUTTS_SCUM_OVERVIEW
